price: Zulqarnayni irraas si gaafatu “Ani isa irraa oduun isin irratti dubbisuuf jira” jedhi.{1}
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا
footnotes: {1} zulqarneyni kan gaafa lamaa jechuudha.mootii gaariidha. dachii bahaa dhiha deemuu Rabbi isaaf mijjeesse. diinitti yaamuu tajaajila hawaasummaa kkaa kaarra jaaree irraa chfuuti hojjae.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
